Q20: Do the GWG recommendations include cut-offs for BMI according to the WHO standards (underweight 
<18.5, normal 18.50–24.99, overweight ≥25, obese ≥30)?
 1   Yes

 3   No information available 
If No, please specify the cut-offs in use: _____________________________
